Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • Brick

  • public class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Brick creates a rectangle (height: 100, width: 20) of the type Rectangle.
    The position of the rectangle in the scene is given with the constructor.
    Author:
    Benedikt Nork (1188594), Geraldine Denise Lengert (1186185), Robert Uwe Litschel (1183829), Nasim Ahmad (1185555)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      the constructor create the rectangle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void angle(double brickUpper, double ballPosY)
      The angle() method returns the angle at which the ball bounces off the generated brick
